name: Mahjong Solitaire Refresh: Ex Panels
summary: "Mahjong Solitaire Refresh Ex Panels" is additional content for "Mahjong Solitaire Refresh". A collection of additional Extreme stages, for those in need of a challenge! Note: Requires the base game "Mahjong Solitiare Refresh" and the in-game conditions for Ex Panels to be cleared to play.
